extension.description: Adds a non-breakable space &nbsp; after each single-letter word (numbers included) and string specified in the setting of the plugin. Removes all non-breakable space &nbsp; in the text. See https://github.com/kofaysi/NBS-tilde-vlna for code.

field.name: labeladd
field.label: Add Button Label
field.description: Enter label text for the button

field.name: NBSPafter
field.label: NBSP afterwards
field.description: List strings and characters requiring a NBSP afterwards. Separate with spaces. Case ignored. Default: [a-z0-9]

field.name: NBSPbefore
field.label: NBSP beforehand
field.description: List strings and characters requiring a NBSP beforehand. Separate with spaces. Case ignored. Default: empty

field.name: labelremove
field.label: Remove Button Label
field.description: Enter label text for the button
